Description of incident: Supervisory Union notified all employees that a serious security breach on its financial computer system was discovered and that their financial information may have been compromised.  The breach was not described in detail, but employees were informed that payroll would be temporarily using paychecks.  Supervisory Union contacted all banking institutions that were involved in direct deposit and informed them that client data may have been compromised.  Employees were also encouraged to contact all banking institutions to review their financial accounts, contact their banks, change their email passwords, and avoid clicking on suspicious emails.
